text: was a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Matsumoto was born in Saitama on August 13, 1934. After graduating from Saitama University, he played for his local club Urawa Club (ja). On December 28, 1958, he debuted for Japan national team against Malaya. He later coached at Urawa Minami High School. The manga Akakichi no Eleven was based on his team. He died of heart disease in Saitama on September 2, 2019, aged 85. ==Statistics== Japan National Football Team Database |- |1958||1||0 |- !Total||1||0 |} ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Footballers from Saitama Prefecture Category:Japan international footballers Category:Deaths from heart disease
title: Gyoji Matsumoto
